channel.title: [PI] Changing the Items that the NPCs Wear
channel.description:
Is there a code that i can put in for the NPC so like E.g. A Archer wears a Magic Shortbow or Dark Bow, Besides a Standard Long/Shortbow? It's the same with the Armor/Armour as well Is there a code for that as well??
This is a request so if this needs to go to the Models help or what ever it is then please can a mod move it.
Also I am not going to do Modelling so the NPCs do wear it.
